title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, and tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui (Open WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web interface for Ollama with chat history, RAG, user management, and plugin system.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with fzf model picker and REPL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, structured output, vision, RAG, fine-tuning, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express.js proxy that adds JWT auth & rate-limiting in front of Ollama.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that combines Ollama with Chroma for PDF-based RAG.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Nim wrapper for the Ollama API with async HTTP and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, embeddings, and vision models.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that exposes Ollama as a tool to Claude Desktop & friends.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python-based Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.
